Take a guided tour

Now that you’ve chosen a language it’s time to get the basics down. I recommend doing a tutorial online.

This guided tour is best done in combination with Take some pictures to create a cheat sheet for yourself as you’re doing the tutorial.

Resources:

If you chosen HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Python, Ruby or Java I can recommend:

CodeCademy

It has lightweight tutorials that teach the basic syntax of a programming language.

If you’ve chosen something other, have a look at this list of resources:

Curated Programming Resources
